title: ULE Homes offers
notes:
CONTENT GOAL- To promote engagement.

TARGET AUDIENCE- Salary earners struggling to pay for apartments they love due to financial constraints.

STAGE OF FUNNEL - Awareness

CONTENT PILLAR- Financial timing problem during rent.

CONTENT FORMAT- 
Instagram - Carousel
X - Slides
TikTok - Carousel Slides
Instagram - Carousel Slides

CONTENT TONE- Witty, empathetic, relatable 

KEY MESSAGE- A new month wish that highlights the pain point ULE Homes solves.

KEYWORDS- May, Expire, Rent

CTA- “Click the link in Bio to get started with ULE Homes, a rent financing service that allows you pay rent without money”

REFERENCE- “May your favourite apartment not be taken by someone else just because your pockets were not ready “

title: CONTENT TOPIC - Low on funds but need to pay your rent? 3 signs you should use ULE Homes.
notes:
CONTENT GOAL- To influence sign up decision

TARGET AUDIENCE- Audience aware of our solution, but sceptical to commit due to objections.

CONTENT FORMAT- (7 pages Carousel. Title, 3 informative slides, CTA)

CONTENT TONE- Relatable, Reassuring, Empathetic

title: You enjoying 12% interest on your refundable down payment with ULE Homes
notes:
1. IG/ TIKTOK

CONTENT GOAL - To educate on down payment feature.

CONTENT FORMAT - MEME VIDEO/TRENDING AUDIO.


CONTENT PILLAR - Product Feature X Product benefits

TARGET AUDIENCE: Audience aware of our product but lacking understanding for down payment feature.


TONE - Trendy, Informative.

KEY MESSAGE - Explain how refundable down payment/ 12%Interest feature works in caption.


CTA- Encourage them to sign up using renting and earning as the benefit.

title: You enjoying your 12% interest on your refundable down payment with ULE Homes.
notes:
IG/ TIKTOK 

CONTENT GOAL- To educate on down payment and interest feature.

CONTENT FORMAT - Comic Reel

CONTENT PILLAR - Product feature X User benefit

TARGET AUDIENCE- Audience aware of solution but lacking understanding understanding for down payment requirements.


TONE - Trendy, Informative.

KEY MESSAGE : Walk audience through the down payment to interest earning process in a simple listicle show casing the two toned benefit of using ULE. (Rent paid, interest earned)


CTA - Encourage them to sign up using the two toned benefit as the enticing reason.
